content.sourceTitle: Let us f@%#ing pray: Ramsay emerges a Christian role mode
content.text: Ramsay says he has a "private, quiet faith" and he prays six times a year when he and his wife go to church. He also admits to praying in a moment of desperation when he found out his young son had a small hole in his heart.

content.sourceTitle: Do any of you think Gordon Ramsay is an atheist?
content.text: Despite some claims that Ramsay is an atheist,
he does believe in God and wishes to instill faith into his children. He said:

content.sourceTitle: Let us f@%#ing pray: Ramsay emerges a Christian role mode
content.text: I want the kids to understand that there is a God and that more times than not we need to turn to him for help.

content.sourceTitle: Let us f@%#ing pray: Ramsay emerges a Christian role mode
content.text: Strangely, Ramsay has emerged as somewhat of a religious figure. The Church of Scotland officially endorsed the foul-mouthed chef as a role model for Christian children. Apparently, Ramsay's trials and tribulations and his ability to succeed despite them warranted a Church of Scotland shout-out.

content.sourceTitle: Gordon Ramsay enjoys Mr. Obama's comedian-in-chief turn
content.text: Ramsay's political views are either non-existent or well-hidden. As famous as he is, he's spent a lot of time around politicians. He attended a charity dinner in Obama's White House

You might want to assume that he would side with the British Conservative Party, considering it's the party of the UK's wealthy, but he sure gave it to Conservative politician Edwina Currie one night on his show:
Do you always two time people Edwina? First you're shagging a Prime Minister, and now you're shagging me up the arse from behind.

content.sourceTitle: ordon Ramsay: Cooks tried to flame grill me
content.text: He did display some possibly liberal views when he took a film crew to try and expose shark poachers in the act in Costa Rica, indicating a possible PETA-like affinity toward animal rights. Incidentally, he was cornered by the poachers, doused in gasoline and held at gunpoint.
Maybe he'll be a conservative after all.
